title: Group portrait of members of the Gay Hilltoppers, including Ruth O'Donnell, Margaret Moore, Georgia Perry, Bernice Leftridge, Martha White, Azalia Horton, Mary Monroe, Marian Bryant, Margaret Cobbs, Dorothy Reed, Gertrude Holmes, Esther Summers, Ruth Comer, Isabel Jones, president; Elizabeth Wallace, Helen Thompson, Ardea Briggs, Alene Young, and Armenter Carter, standing on stairs outside of the home of Margaret Cobbs with stained glass windows, another version
medium: black and white: Agfa Safety Film
